title: Rain in the sun
brief_description: In some regions of Japan a sunshower is known as a “Kitsune no Yomein” which literally means “Foxes’ Wedding”. This simplistic poetic 2-d animated tale illustrates the legend behind “Kitsune no Yomein”. Introduction in Japanese language with English subtitles.
